typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(department,'3')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['filteroutput'],
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		department
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
